author: andreas
content: I do that with only a selected few images. Verticals don't work on monitors anyway. If you look at my images, more than half are verticals. Of the horizontals, most are composed in a way that cropping them to a wide-screen monitor format would destroy the composition. Thus: no, in general I don't do it.
